content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: CreateSiteDeliveryDomain path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/delivery/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/sites/{site_id}/delivery_domains content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name siteid
desc a site id
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum add a delivery domain to a site
reqbody
deliverycreatesitedeliverydomainrequest
type obj
domain
type str
desc the delivery domain to add to a site
required true
responses
200
deliverycreatesitedeliverydomainresponse
type obj
schemadeliverydeliverydomain
type obj
props
domain
type str
desc a sites domain name
validatedat
type str
format datetime
desc the date the domain was validated to be pointing to us
desc an individual delivery domain
desc the response from a request to add a hostname to a cdn site scope
title: 8_Delivery Domains_CreateSiteDeliveryDomain_47.json
